# GCInputRightThumbstickButton

**Global Variable**

The name of the right thumbstick button element.

## Declaration

```swift
var GCInputRightThumbstickButton: String { get }
```

## Related Documentation

- **rightThumbstickButton**: The button on the right thumbstick of the controller.

## Thumbstick names

- **GCInputLeftThumbstick**: The name of the left thumbstick element.
- **GCInputRightThumbstick**: The name of the right thumbstick element.
- **GCInputLeftThumbstickButton**: The name of the left thumbstick button element.
